name: You are two (TheFatCat)
description:
A game, where you play as two independent characters, each equipped with a unique ability. You have to work together with yourself, to complete a set of differrent puzzles and obstacles.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 in the matter of 6 days entirely by me.  If this game does well, I might improve upon it with more levels and a sandbox mode. 

Have fun!
